# attributedText

**Instance Property**

An attributed variant of the primary text.

## Declaration

```swift
var attributedText: NSAttributedString? { get set }
```

## Discussion

This value supersedes the [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIListContentConfiguration-swift.struct/text] property.

## Customizing content

- **image**: The image to display.
- **text**: The primary text.
- **secondaryText**: The secondary text.
- **secondaryAttributedText**: An attributed variant of the secondary text.

items.description: An attributed variant of the secondary text.
